txt.en: 'I know I heard sumtin out here... Come out ya little lout!'

This terrible butcher's blade has taken a deadly toll upon the noble steeds of the Rohirrim and the tithed cattle of the Dunlendings alike.\n\nNo doubt, the villainous butcher that wields it is somewhere nearby. Dispatching the fiend might be considered some form of reprisal to honour the mounts of the Rohirrim.
'Can't say I much like the taste of horse m'self, but I'm doubly sure those riders would be keen to know that the beast responsible for theiving away their steeds and turning them into Warg chow.'
You discovered an enormous butcher's knife in the bowels of a goblin slaughter-house where the Rohirrim steeds were brought to serve as feed for the Wargs.
The goblin-butcher may be found somewhere in the caves of western Nan Curun√≠r.\n\nYou should dispatch the goblin-butcher for his foul crimes.
